title: Login Error
body:
Updated client now I get this rubbish, the past 2 patches have broken something with my client and I end up having to post here

All help on how to fix would be appreciated

replies.body:
Hey there,

The only way to fix this is to [force a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) on your client, let me know if this helps.
